text.div:
Creatinine Clearance

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    12195-4 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 24 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13441-1 Creatinine renal clearance in 4 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13442-9 Creatinine renal clearance in 6 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13443-7 Creatinine renal clearance in 8 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13446-0 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 4 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13447-8 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 6 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13449-4 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 8 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    13450-2 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 12 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    2163-4 Creatinine renal clearance in 12 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    2164-2 Creatinine renal clearance in 24 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    26752-6 Creatinine renal clearance in 2 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    33558-8 Creatinine renal clearance in Urine and Serum or Plasma collected for unspecified duration
    35591-7 Creatinine renal clearance predicted by Cockcroft-Gault formula
    35593-3 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in Urine and Serum or Plasma collected for unspecified duration
    35594-1 Creatinine renal clearance/1.73 sq M in 2 hour Urine and Serum or Plasma
    70957-6 Creatinine clearance corrected for body surface area using standard methods [ESRD]
